tool_description: Calculates comprehensive infrastructure deployment costs including equipment, construction, labor, and site preparation based on site characteristics and technical requirements.

site_type.description: Type of installation: tower, rooftop, small_cell, das

accessibility_score.description: Site accessibility score from Site Access Analyzer (1-10)

foundation_type.description: Foundation type from Foundation Requirements Calculator

backhaul_cost.description: Backhaul connectivity cost from Backhaul Cost Estimator

terrain_difficulty.description: Terrain difficulty from Site Access Analyzer

error_messages: Invalid site type: Use tower, rooftop, small_cell, or das.
Invalid structure height: Height must be a positive number.
Invalid accessibility score: Score must be between 1 and 10.
Invalid foundation type: Foundation type not recognized.
Invalid power requirements: Power must be a positive number.
Invalid equipment tier: Use basic, standard, or premium.
Invalid construction complexity: Use simple, moderate, or complex.
Cost calculation failed: Unable to calculate costs with provided parameters.
usage: Provide site specifications and requirements from other analysis tools. The tool calculates total infrastructure costs including all major components and complexity factors.

construction_cost.description: Construction and labor cost in USD

total_infrastructure_cost.description: Total infrastructure deployment cost in USD
